
=== 12.06.2011 JQWicket 0.6 released. [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/downloads/detail?name=jqwicket-0.6-dist.zip Download distribution here] ===

- Ground up refactoring of the existing JQuery API wrapper (see [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/api/IJQStatement.java IJQStatement], [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/api/IJQFunction.java IJQFunction], [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/api/IJQOptions.java IJQOptions] and  [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/api/JQLiteral.java JQLiteral] classes)

- Added JQuery Selector Builder API (see [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/api/S.java com.google.code.jqwicket.api.S] class)

- Upgraded JQuery to v.1.6.1 and JQueryUI to v.1.8.13

- Added JQuery noConflict mode support (see [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/source/browse/tags/jqwicket-0.6/src/main/java/com/google/code/jqwicket/JQContributionConfig.java JQContributionConfig] class)

- Added cookie support to the JQuery UI Tabs Behavior

- Added possibility to render custom javascript / jquery statements outside the "documentReady" block

=== 30.04.2011 JQWicket 0.5 released. [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket/downloads/detail?name=jqwicket-0.5-dist.zip Download distribution here] ===

- Package refactoring.. *{{{com.google.code.jqwicket}}}* is now the base package and maven's groupId

- Upgraded JQuery to v.1.5.2 and JQueryUI to v.1.8.12

- Upgraded Wicket to v.1.4.17

- Added [http://jquery.malsup.com/block/ BlockUI JQuery plugin] implementation

- Added [http://playground.mobily.pl/jquery/mobily-map.html/ Mobilymap JQuery plugin] implementation
